You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesX X] > &xscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Xscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B3.
  * `&xscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4CD.
